original_text: And they took it on that day, and smote it with the edge of the sword, and all the souls that were therein he utterly destroyed that day, according to all that he had done to Lachish.
korean_text: 그 날에 그 성읍을 취하고 칼날로 그것을 쳐서 그 중에 있는 모든 사람을 당일에 진멸하여 바쳤으니 라기스에 행한 것과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: And they took it on that day
and smote it with the edge of the sword
and all the souls that were therein
according to all that he had done to Lachish
sentences.korean_translation: 라기스에게 행한 모든 것 같이 하였더라
